Package arrayGenerator

Class RandomListingGenerator

java.lang.Object
arrayGenerator.SortedListingGenerator
arrayGenerator.RandomListingGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArrayGenerator, ListingGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
CleverRandomListingGenerator, SimpleRandomListingGenerator
public abstract class RandomListingGenerator
extends SortedListingGenerator
An array generator that generates an array containing the values 0..n in random order. This abstract class does not specify how the contents of the array are randomised - this must be implemented in concrete extensions of this class.
Version:
September 2020
Author:
Hugh Osborne

  • Method Details

    • randomise

      protected abstract void randomise()
      Randomise the order of the elements in the array

    • timedMethod

      public void timedMethod()
      The timed method for RandomListingGenerators is the randomise method.

    • getRandomIndex

      protected int getRandomIndex()
      A utility to provide a random index within the range of indices of the array generated by this array generator.
      Returns:
      an integer index between 0 and size-1 inclusive, where size is the size of the array generated by this array generator.
